mapper.update: UPDATE book b SET evaluation_score = ( SELECT IFNULL(AVG(score),0) FROM evaluation e WHERE e.book_id = b.book_id and state = 'enable' ),evaluation_quantity = ( SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(*),0) FROM evaluation e WHERE e.book_id = b.book_id and state = 'enable' )
mapper.select: select b.book_id bookId,b.book_name bookName , b.sub_title subTitle ,b.author , b.cover , b.description , b.category_id categoryId , b.evaluation_score evaluationScore , b.evaluation_quantity evaluationQuantity , c.category_name categoryName from book b,category c where b.category_id = c.category_id
